title: Nominations Sent to the Senate, 4/02/09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 02, 2009

 



Nominations Sent to the Senate, 4/02/09




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  __________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                  April 2, 2009  NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:   Andre M. Davis, of Maryland, to be United States Circuit Judge for the Fourth Circuit, vice Francis D. Murnaghan, Jr., deceased.   Gerard E. Lynch, of New York, to be United States Circuit Judge for the Second Circuit, vice Chester J. Straub, retired.
